trends: There have been no other sightings in Whitefield
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsthis event was reported by local newspaper journalist to mufon state director, *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg). the journalist did not submit a report and the witnesses did not submit a report. this report is being submitted by the sd. it is being reported only for documentation of triangles seen in e oklahoma area. i went to stigler and met with the reporter on 10\14\10 and he introduced me to two separate witnesses. one saw the triangle on 9\16\10 and the other triangle was seen by two people on 10\26\10. second triangle was a different shape. very elongated triangle the witness for first event took us to the field and we walked the field during the day. the field had been plowed and bails of hay were there in the area. we found a spot where it was circular with green grass on outer edge and center has a bare spot. appearance was that nothing was growing in the bare area. rain may have washed out any imprints. it may be that the bare spot in the middle may have been created by the tail end of the triangular object. geiger counter showed no readings. see attached photo. witness indicated the lights were white and went down the side of the triangle and it was hovering when she first got a glimpse of it from the highway 2 area. object suddenly turned straight up with the tail down when she drove past it. she turned around farther down highway 2 and went back to get a look, but it was gone. using michael schratt's drawings of classified aircraft she pointed out that it looked like the tr3-b aircraft. it was about 3 stories high based on her view from the highway. estimate is the object was about 300 feet on each side. 10\26\10 event: husband and wife were outside about 10:30 pm looking at the stars through their telescope. they happened to look up and saw a huge elongated triangle right above them. it blocked out the stars and sky and they thought it was about the size of a city block. back end appeared to be concave. it was black with single rotating white lights on each corner of the object. no sound was heard. it moved slower than an airplane, but also disappeared from their view quickly. they live in the country where neighbors are not very close to each other. land has large trees with some open spaces. once again using michael schratt's drawings they pointed out the east german flying triangle which shows the shape of the triangle. note attached drawing
Summary: Triangle hovering & moved to upright position onto tail end
